meta.title: An Overview of the Expression of Worship Section

nodes.body: This follows the Homage. It is an expression of worship to a Buddha, Bodhisattva, teacher, or whomever is held in high religious esteem. Can be prose or verse (it is frequently verse). Generally ends with ཕྱག་འཚལ་ or གུས་ or འདུད་ or བསྟོད་.
